patthana2.3:511.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.3:514.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri … pe … nasamanantare cattāri, naupanissaye cattāri … pe … namagge cattāri … pe … navippayutte cattāri, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana2.3:516.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (anulomapadāni gaṇitabbāni) … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.3:521.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.3:521.2: āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.3:521.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …. #1
patthana2.3:522.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.3:523.1: (Yathā cūḷantaraduke lokiyadukaṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ ninnānākaraṇaṃ, saṃkhittaṃ.)
